title: AI Readiness Assessment
description: Assess your organization's AI maturity and receive tailored recommendations.

questions.text: How clear is your organization’s strategy for using AI?
How prepared is your data and IT infrastructure for AI adoption?

options.label: Limited data collection or siloed systems
Some structured data, but not integrated
Data is integrated but limited AI-ready infrastructure
Strong, scalable infrastructure and high-quality data

questions.text: How would you rate your team’s knowledge of AI and automation?
How much of your workflow is ready for automation or AI-driven improvements?

options.label: Some manual processes identified for automation
Several processes already automated or piloted
Many processes optimized with AI or automation

questions.text: How open is your organization to adopting AI-driven tools and changes?

options.label: Open to change with right support
Strong culture of innovation and adoption

levels.label: AI Beginner
levels.description: Your company is at the very beginning of the AI journey. There is great potential to save time and resources by starting with basic tools. The next step is to identify your most time-consuming manual processes and apply simple AI solutions.
levels.cta: Book a free workshop to review your results and create an AI action plan tailored to your needs.

levels.label: AI Explorer
levels.description: You have started experimenting with AI and see the potential. Now it's time to structure your work, define a clear strategy, and integrate AI into specific processes where you can measure results.
levels.cta: Book a free workshop to transform your early experiments into a structured AI roadmap with measurable business outcomes.

levels.label: AI Leader
levels.description: AI is already part of your business, and you are ahead of many competitors. The focus now is scaling your solutions, optimizing advanced data analysis, and building custom AI tools to create a long-term market advantage.
levels.cta: Book a free workshop to explore advanced use cases, innovation opportunities, and scaling strategies for your AI initiatives.
